channel.title: So jagex enjoys playing on private servers
channel.description:
I just recently got a dmca notice with this attached, I found it to be a rather interesting read.
http://silabsoft.org/client.silabsoft.org.docx

item.title: So jagex enjoys playing on private servers
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

looks like they owned you, their screenshots look much better than yours

item.title: So jagex enjoys playing on private servers
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

That was an interesting read.

sanga282:

shoulda sent him a bunch of emails saying that you will close down your site on april the 1st and then take them offline for like a few hours then started them back up, i think he would thoroughly appreciate the humour

no.

item.title: So jagex enjoys playing on private servers
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

arent most of those things they complained about server side modification? (calling of interfaces, quest names, whats in the tabs etc) Also i like the way they are rocking through their game with 99 eveyrthing cheatin fuckers. Im with mopar though, tell them you cant open .docx

item.title: So jagex enjoys playing on private servers
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Well I’m shocked. I never even suspected that the ‘silabsoft client’ was a modified version of the runescape client until I read that very professional and detailed report. :rolleyes:

I would respond to them saying that you can’t open .docx files and you prefer the .odt format. (Seriously though, no professional organization sends around .doc, .docx, .odt or any word processing file, it should be .pdf)

Read full topic
